name: LowDoseNonComboICS
title: Low Dose Non Combo ICS
description: Derived from the NHLBI value set 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1196.483 Non Combo Low Dose ICS Preparations for Asthma in Adults 12 Years of Age and Older
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Non-combination inhaled corticosteroids which have a potency of low dose with standard instructions per GINA guideline (Global Strategy for Asthma Management and Prevention).),(Data Element Scope: DRUG_CLASS_MEMBERS: PHARMACOLOGIC:),(Inclusion Criteria: Active, prescribable RXCUIs of SCD and SBD termtype),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-prescribable and retired RxCUIs. Nasal corticosteroids.)
